summary: In this context, 1,1,2-trichloroethene (TCE) is mentioned as a specific chemical used in a study examining its volatilization kinetics under different conditions, including the application of low-frequency electromagnetic fields (LF-EMF) and the use of nano zero-valent iron (NZVI). TCE is categorized as a chemical, but the context does not elaborate on its broader implications or interactions with other chemicals beyond its use in the study.
